stories.headline: Moneyed interests
stories.summary: An investigation reveals a direct correlation between campaign contributions and preferential treatment by Wisconsin Governor Tommy Thompson, including a specific case involving Ron Van Den Heuvel.

stories.headline: Homes for sale
stories.summary: Analysis of trends in home values reveals how local real estate impacts readers, emphasizing the importance of data-driven reporting.

stories.headline: Trial of the century
stories.summary: Discussion on the impending Y2K problem and its potential impacts on various sectors, emphasizing the importance of readiness.
